title: bersekerbarragexxx
author: bersekerbarragexxx
content: Some random homo sapiens created this token "Binance Smart Chain: 0x2137416730E706cc1B77F06c11f7dC56A193295A" named "DeSnakeAlphaBayDogeInu(MONERO)" and gave me 21 million units of it.So what is realistc about this token?Will I keep this 21 million tokens with me forever and will never worth 1 cent?Is it just an ape mental illness that has no liquidity and will never have and am sitting in 21 million nothings.I really dont know.My Wallet containing 21M0x45937B7C8E01E73Cb9aE72649c23834909be69A5

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Yes it is worthless because no sane person will buy them. What you're talking about is actually a scam scheme. Since you won't be able to exchange them in established exchanges, the most common tactic is they will ask you to do it in their malicious website where you'll be requested to connect your wallet/approve stuff when it would actually steal your coins. Do not engage!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Be careful of that thing don't ever to try to authorize them when you are trying to exchange this token this is a common issue on ETH chain. Like the above said it is most likely a scam scheme I also have airdrops on my wallet both ETH and BSC chain and all of them are worthless. Just ignore them and your wallet is safe. I suggest you read this "[Scam Alert] Beware of Airdrops that will drain tokens out of your address."
